decisions.name: International Space Cooperation Treaty
decisions.description: Form a global alliance to tackle the alien threat and expand into the solar system.

decisions.name: Establish Lunar Base
decisions.description: Set up a base on the Moon to serve as a launch point for further space exploration.

decisions.name: United in threat
decisions.description: Form a global alliance to accelerate research and innovation against the alien threat.

decisions.name: Mars Colonization Initiative
decisions.description: Start the colonization of Mars to secure new resources and living space.

decisions.name: Space Defense Network
decisions.description: Develop a comprehensive defense system to protect Earth and colonies from alien attacks.

decisions.name: Asteroid Mining Operations
decisions.description: Initiate mining operations on asteroids to gather essential resources for space expansion.

decisions.name: Venus Research Stations
decisions.description: Set up research stations on Venus to study its atmosphere and potential for colonization.

decisions.name: Earth Preservation Program
decisions.description: Implement measures to maintain Earth's habitability while expanding into space.

decisions.name: Jovian Moon Colonies
decisions.description: Begin the colonization of the moons of Jupiter to expand human presence in the solar system.

decisions.name: Solar Power Satellites
decisions.description: Deploy satellites to collect solar energy and beam it back to Earth.

decisions.name: Terraforming Mars
decisions.description: Invest in long-term terraforming projects to make Mars more habitable.

decisions.name: Space Tourism Industry
decisions.description: Develop a thriving space tourism industry to fund further space exploration.

decisions.name: Martian Agriculture
decisions.description: Develop advanced agricultural techniques to support colonies on Mars.

decisions.name: Neptune's Moon Bases
decisions.description: Establish bases on Neptune's moons to further human reach in the solar system.

decisions.name: Global Resource Sharing Agreement
decisions.description: Create an agreement for sharing resources gathered from space among all nations.

decisions.name: Space Mining Regulations
decisions.description: Implement regulations to ensure ethical and sustainable mining practices in space.

decisions.name: Fusion Energy Research
decisions.description: Invest in research to harness fusion energy for sustainable power.

decisions.name: Martian Military Outpost
decisions.description: Establish a military outpost on Mars to protect colonies and resources.

decisions.name: Artificial Intelligence Development
decisions.description: Develop AI technologies to enhance space operations and research.

decisions.name: Space Habitat Construction
decisions.description: Build space habitats to support long-term human presence in space.

decisions.name: Galactic Trade Network
decisions.description: Establish a trade network connecting Earth and its colonies for resource exchange.
